naslov: Čiovo, Slatine - apartmanska kuća sa bazenom PRODAJA (prodaja)
opis: Agencija za nekretnine Angelus nekretnine Vam nude na prodaju novouređenu kamenu kuću na predjelu Kaštela LOKACIJA Kuća se nalazi u malom mirom mjestu Slatine, sjeveroistočnom dijelu otoka Čiova.  nalazi 500 m od lijepih šljunčanih plaža u Slatinama na otoku Čiovu u mirnom predjelu. Otok Čiovo je sa dva mosta spojen sa kopnom odnosno gradom Trogirom. Kuća je udaljena 10 km od zračne luke te 35 km od Splita. Slatine su jedino mjesto na otoku Čiovu koje pripada gradu Splitu. Mjesto je tokom sezone povezano brzom brodskom linijom i sa Splitom i sa Trogirom. OPIS Kuća izgrađena izgrađena 2002.godine se nalazi na parceli veličine skoro 1300 m2, ukupne je neto površine 300 m2 te se sastoji od prizemlja, kata i potkrovlja. Kuća je podijeljena na 5 odvojenih stambenih jedinica odnosno apartmana. U prizemlju se nalaze dva apartmana od kojih se svaki sastoji od dnevnog dijela sa kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonice, toaleta te balkona. Na 1. katu su tri apartmana; Prvi apartman se sastoji od dnevnog dijela sa kuhinjom, jedne spavaće sobe, kupaonice i balkona sa pogledom na more. Drugi apartman je veći i ima dvije spavaće sobe. Treći apartman je u roh bau stanju iz kojeg se izlazi u potkrovlje koje se isto može prenamijeniti u veliki stambeni prostor. odnosno apartman. Svaki apartman ima veliki balkon sa kojih se pruža lijep otvoren pogled i na more i na zelenilo. Na okućnici površine cca 1100 m2 nalaze se bazen i sunčalište, stabla maslina i razno bilje, roštilj te 4 mjesta za parkiranje. Ispod bazena je strojarnica. Plaže se nalaze duž cijele obale kroz mjesto Slatine te su udaljene 500 m od kuće. Osim plaža tu se nalaze i restorani i razni kafići. Trgovine i pristanište za brod su također udaljeni 500 m od kuće. Kuća je godinama u turističkom najmu. Agencijska provizija se obračunava u skladu s Općim uvjetima poslovanja i cjeniku objavljenima na https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama. Za više informacija obratite se našem agentu na 091/466-1500. Vaše Angelus nekretnine d.o.o. ______________________________________ Real estate agency Angelus Real Estate offers you a newly renovated stone house for sale in the Kaštela area The house is located in a small, quiet village of Slatine, in the northeastern part of the island of Čiovo. It is located 500 m from the beautiful pebble beaches in Slatine on the island of Čiovo in a quiet area. The island of Čiovo is connected to the mainland, namely the city of Trogir, by two bridges. The house is 10 km from the airport and 35 km from Split. Slatine is the only place on the island of Čiovo that belongs to the city of Split. During the season, the place is connected by a fast boat line to both Split and Trogir. The house built in 2002 is located on a plot of almost 1300 m2, with a total net area of ​​300 m2 and consists of a ground floor, first floor and attic. The house is divided into 5 separate residential units or apartments. On the ground floor there are two apartments, each of which consists of a living area with a kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet and a balcony. On the 1st floor there are three apartments; The first apartment consists of a living area with a kitchen, one bedroom, a bathroom and a balcony with a sea view. The second apartment is larger and has two bedrooms. The third apartment is in unfinished condition from which there is an exit to the attic, which can also be converted into a large living space. or apartment. Each apartment has a large balcony with a beautiful open view of the sea and greenery. On the garden of approximately 1100 m2 there is a swimming pool and a sunbathing area, olive trees and various plants, a barbecue and 4 parking spaces. Below the pool is the engine room. Beaches are located along the entire coast through the town of Slatine and are 500 m away from the house. In addition to the beaches, there are also restaurants and various cafes. Shops and a boat dock are also 500 m away from the house. The house has been rented out to tourists for years. The agency commission is calculated in accordance with the General Business Conditions and the price list published at https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama. For more information, contact our agent at 091/466-1500. Your Angelus nekretnine d.o.o.
